alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Gaines; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 24 at 4:23AM CST until November 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING TO NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts in the Guadalupe Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and west Texas. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening to noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.
